#globalagenda Too much passive voice? If we want better education, WE need to vote for politicians and taxes to pay more to good teachers.
#globalagenda  If we focus on making people productive (skilled, educated, motivated), the jobs will find them or they will create jobs.
#globalagenda Message to corps: Invest in training your startup partners, suppliers, customers to make yr own business healthier.
#globalagenda  Education is the key to solving every other problem on the list.
#globalagenda  For every successful entrepreneur, we need 10, 100, ultimately 1000s of team members.
#globalagenda Entrepreneurs need good customers even more than they need money.
#globalagenda  What is a scalable startup? One that can survive the departure of its founder and that generates more value than it consumes.
